title: Enchanting Floral Cascade Earrings - Adorable Baalis
materials: 18K Rose Gold with White Gold accents; Yellow Sapphires (Kanaka Ratnam)
and Blue Sapphires; Brilliant Cut Diamonds.
features: Whimsical floral design featuring a delicate cascade of flowers. The earrings are adorned with multiple precious and semi-precious stones, creating a stunning visual impact. Features an intricate stone setting that enhances the brilliance of each gemstone.
occasions: and everyday elegance. Suitable for both traditional Indian attire and contemporary outfits.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic; radiant color palette that complements various skin tones; symbol of beauty and blossoming. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, ensuring all-day glamour.
